Package islandtrader.core

Class Tradable

java.lang.Object
islandtrader.core.Entity
islandtrader.core.Tradable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Item, Upgrade
public abstract class Tradable
extends Entity
Class that represents a basic item or upgrade that will be traded between Trader and Island'Stores
Author:
Maria Heloisa Balzaretti

  • Method Details

    • getPriceToBuy

      public float getPriceToBuy()
      Gets the item/upgrade priceToBuy of this Tradable. The price that store will accept to pay the trader to buy the Tradable from the trader
      Returns:
      this Tradable's priceToBuy.

    • setPriceToBuy

      public void setPriceToBuy​(float priceToBuy)
      Changes the priceToBuy of this Tradable. The price that store will accept to pay trader to buy from the trader
      Parameters:
      priceToBuy - This Tradable's new priceToBuy.

    • getPriceToSell

      public float getPriceToSell()
      Gets the item or upgrade priceToSell of this Tradable. The price that store will accept to receive from trader to sell the item/upgrade to the trader
      Returns:
      this Tradable's priceToSell.

    • setPriceToSell

      public void setPriceToSell​(float priceToSell)
      Changes the priceToSell of this Tradable. The price that store will accept to receive from trader to sell the item or upgrade to the trader
      Parameters:
      priceToSell - This Tradable's new priceToSell.
